name: PRIME Pool
description: The PRIME Pool mostly consists of PRIME, the native token of the Prime ecosystem. Liquidity mining programs are popular for this pool.
story:
PRIME Pool
This is the first pool launched by PrimeDAO. Biased towards PRIME, the native token of the Prime ecosystem, this pool is meant to be the default liquidity pool for long-term PRIME holders.
Methodology
The pool's parameters are governed by members of PrimeDAO. An example parameter is the balance of the pool's respective assets. To learn more about the governance process, please visit the documentation.

name: BLxPR Pool
description: The BLxPR Pool is a DAO2DAO pool between Balancer and PrimeDAO. The pool is the first instance of a D2D pool, a shared liquidity pool between DAOs.
story:
BLxPR Pool
The BLxPR Pool is a DAO2DAO pool between Balancer and PrimeDAO. The pool is the first instance of a D2D pool, a shared liquidity pool between DAOs. BLxPR consists of 50% BAL and 50% PRIME.
Methodology
BLxPR aligns the values and incentives of the Balancer Protocol and PrimeDAO by providing shared liquidity and mutual ownership. The Pool tokens contributed to the development of Prime Launch and Prime Pools, two products developed by PrimeDAO on top of the Balancer Protocol.
BLxPR Discord Channel: http://discord.primedao.io
BLxPR Snapshot: https://snapshot.org/#/blxpr.eth
